attributes.description:
MKR AUTO SALES
2011 A4 Audi 1.8T (B8) Ambition for Sale!!!
Visit us at 495 Cape Road, Westering, Port Elizabeth and Plot 2704 Dyke Road, Algoa Park Port Elizabeth, and speak to us for the friendliest service and the best deals in town!
Features:
Aircon
Airbags
Power Steering
Alarm/Central Locking
Electric Windows
ABS Braking System
Electric Mirrors
Beautiful Cloth Interior
Factory Fitted Audio System
Service History
Recently Serviced
234060kms
Awesome Vehicle!
On special now for just R129990.00!!!
Trade-ins welcomed
Financing is available with all major banks to creditworthy clients only
1 or 2 Year Warranty Options Available
Price excludes on-road charges
Vehicles transported countrywide at an additional cost
Vehicles Wanted For Cash Daily
Cars, Bakkies, SUVs, Panel Vans, D/Cabs and Kombis
Change Of Ownership Done Immediately
We Buy and Sell Vehicles 365 Days A Year In And Around P.E Area
Vehicles bought with immediate EFT payment
Wide variety of cars to choose from
Spotters fees paid on successful referrals

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 5 year or 120 000kms warranty and a 5 year or 90 000kms service plan, expring in August 2024.
Price includes Bullbar, Rollbar, Towbar and side steps, valued at R25000.
This is an excellent bakkie, still in very good condition. A reliable bakkie, with room to put a lot more kms on the clock. The extended cab is the perfect option if you need a vehicle for both personal and business use. It has plenty of space behind the seats, to keep your tools, or seven shopping, safe and dry.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. he All-New BR-V is designed with simplicity in mind. Enjoy an uncluttered dash with high quality materials and finishes within the cabin, focusing on creating a comfortable space for all.

The BR-V also features a brand new 7-inch touch screen system with integrated Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity. The driver is presented with a 4.2" display located on the dashboard which provides them with various types of information. 

Warranty - 5 years/200 000kms
Service Plan - 4 years/60 000kms
3 years Roadside Assistance
